member.name: IFileDialogControlEvents.OnButtonClicked
member.summary: Called when the user clicks a command button.
member.param: A pointer to the interface through which the application added controls to the dialog.
The ID of the button that the user clicked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogControlEvents.OnCheckButtonToggled
member.summary: Called when the user changes the state of a check button (check box).
member.param: A pointer to the interface through which the application added controls to the dialog.
The ID of the button that the user clicked.
A BOOL indicating the current state of the check button. TRUE if checked; FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogControlEvents.OnControlActivating
member.summary: Called when an Open button drop-down list customized through or a Tools menu is about to display its contents.
member.param: A pointer to an object through which the application adds controls to the dialog.
The ID of the list or menu about to display.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogControlEvents.OnItemSelected
member.summary: Called when an item is selected in a combo box, when a user clicks an option button (also known as a radio button), or an item is chosen from the Tools menu.
member.param: A pointer to the interface through which the application added controls to the dialog.
The ID of the control in which the user made a selection.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogControlEvents
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow an application to be notified of events that are related to controls that the application has added to a common file dialog.
